name: Green Thumb (UF Digital Worlds Institute)
description:
Green Thumb

Created by Joseph Panara

A quiet afternoon in the garden tending to the plants, until the poorly-worded wish fairy misinterprets your desires and you find yourself on the dark comedy gardening adventure of a lifetime.

This 2D top-down world and characters have to be experienced to be believed. You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll be amazed that this game is free and wish for more like this ... then stop yourself, but it is too late, the poorly-worded wish fairy heard you and now you are about to have the wish you didn't make granted too.

Download quickly, this is pure digital fun at your fingertips.
